title: PostgreSQL 9 4 per devops (in English)
description:
The world’s best open source database won’t stop improving! Discover the
new features introduced in PostgreSQL 9.4, classified from a devops
point of view, in particular:

logical streaming replication, the foundation of bi-directional and
multi-master replication JSONB data type support, dedicated to NoSQL
lovers! concurrent refresh of materialised views, dedicated to data
warehouse fans!
